query:
-- Add 2 years (63072000000 milliseconds) to all hotel dates
UPDATE hotels
SET 
  checkInDate = checkInDate + 63072000000,
  checkOutDate = checkOutDate + 63072000000
WHERE tripId = 30001;

-- Verify the update
SELECT 
  name,
  FROM_UNIXTIME(checkInDate/1000) as checkIn,
  FROM_UNIXTIME(checkOutDate/1000) as checkOut
FROM hotels
WHERE tripId = 30001
ORDER BY checkInDate;
